content: अप्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अपां इदं तत्रसाधु संस्कृतं वा यत्; अद्भिः संस्कृतं <ls>P. IV. 4. 134</ls>] {@--1@} Connected with or coming from water <ls>Rv. 2. 38. 7</ls>; watery; consisting of, consecrated with, water (as हविः). {@--2@} Obtainable. {@--3@} Active, connected with sacrificial acts <ls n="Rv.">1. 145. 5.</ls>
